discussion.p: The current specification of recursion_pending() says (/24):

blockquote.p: Returns: true if disable_recursion_pending() has not been called subsequent to the prior construction or increment operation, otherwise false.

discussion.p: This language does not take into account cases where the prior construction was a copy construction from a iterator, it, where it.recursion_pending() == false.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4582.

blockquote.p:
